statements: SELECT * FROM survey_results;
SELECT survey_name, response FROM survey_results WHERE respondent_id = 123;
SELECT question_text, COUNT(response) AS response_count FROM survey_results GROUP BY question_text;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_name FROM survey_results;
SELECT * FROM survey_results ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE respondent_id = 1 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, question_text FROM survey_results WHERE response = 'Yes';
SELECT DISTINCT survey_name FROM survey_results WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(respondent_id) AS avg_respondent_id FROM survey_results GROUP BY survey_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_results GROUP BY respondent_id ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, response_date FROM survey_results WHERE respondent_id = 100;
SELECT survey_name, response FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT stakeholder_name, email FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM survey_results ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, response_date FROM survey_results WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT stakeholder_name, email FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id = 3;
SELECT respondent_id, response FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND response LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys, AVG(respondent_id) AS avg_respondents FROM survey_results;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, question1 FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, survey_id, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT stakeholder_email FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id = 2;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_id, answer1 FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id = 3;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_id, answer1 FROM survey_results WHERE respondent_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT stakeholder_name, stakeholder_email FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM survey_results;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_name, response FROM survey_results;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, response FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM survey_participants WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_results;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_name FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM survey_participants WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, question_text, answer_type FROM survey_results JOIN survey_questions ON survey_results.survey_id = survey_questions.survey_id;

SELECT survey_name, participant_name, question_text, answer FROM survey_results JOIN survey_responses ON survey_results.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id JOIN survey_participants ON survey_responses.participant_id = survey_participants.participant_id ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT survey_name, start_date, end_date FROM Surveys WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM SurveyQuestions LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT survey_name, start_date, end_date FROM Surveys WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, email FROM Participants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE survey_id = 'abcdef01-abcd-1234-ef00-0123456789ab';
SELECT answer_text, answer_time FROM SurveyAnswers WHERE question_id = '98765432-abcd-1234-ef00-0123456789ab' ORDER BY answer_time DESC;
